Context: The Convocation ceremonies at George Brown College will take place from June 12-16, 2023. Graduates can order custom frames for their diplomas, certificates or degrees through the college. Frames are high quality and easy to assemble without tools. Pre-ordered frames cannot be picked up at Convocation but can be shipped or picked up at the St. James Campus Bookstore. Guests can purchase celebratory bouquets of flowers for graduates through Commencement Group, which will have a booth at the entrance to Meridian Hall. Pre-ordered flowers will be available for pick-up at the venue on the day of the graduate's ceremony. George Brown College sells convocation t-shirts online at www.convocationflowers.ca/georgebrown. For more information, visitors can contact ask.george@georgebrown.ca or visit the college's social media hub. The website's contents are subject to change without notice. The contact numbers for the college are 416-415-2000 and TTY: 1-877-515-5559.
